contenido: The Contax G1 is a 35mm film camera released by the German company Contax in the 1990s.

The camera features a Nikon 35mm f/2.8 lens, providing excellent image quality and suitable for landscape.
The Leica M3 is a legendary 35mm rangefinder camera produced by the German manufacturer Leica from 1954 to 1967.
The Zeiss Biogon 35mm is a popular lens produced by Carl Zeiss, a renowned German optics manufacturer.
The Leica Elmar is a series of camera lenses produced by the German manufacturer Leica Camera AG.
